thread.section_title: banggood 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 banggood 的点评意见 | www.banggood.com
thread.title: Oscar Morales
thread.title_full: banggood 的点评人 Oscar Morales

author: Oscar Morales
title: Oscar Morales
text: As stated in the title, they have great selection, good prices, and great customer service. Delivery is slow, as almost everything coming from China is, but it always arrives, at least that's my experience. Out of all the products I've purchased from them, only one arrived slightly wrong, because of not very good packaging, but customer service responded immediately to my concerns and solved the issue in 24 hrs. So, all in all, I'm very pleased with this store.
